name: read_knowledgebase
description: Read the current content of the shared knowledgebase

function.name: read_knowledgebase
function.description: Read the current content of the shared knowledgebase. The knowledgebase is an in-memory multiline string shared between all agents for coordination and information sharing. Use this tool to understand what information other agents have already discovered or documented.

response_format.description: Returns JSON object with 'success' (boolean), 'timestamp' (ISO string), 'tool_name' (string), 'content' (current knowledgebase content), 'length' (content length), and 'lines' (number of lines). Error responses include 'error' field with detailed message.
